tool_description: Uncover valuable insights from realtor.com's extensive property listings. Search, filter, retrieve and all!
name: Realtor
title: Realtor

api_list.name: getProperty
api_list.description: Returns all the detailed information of a property by its permalink
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtor26.p.rapidapi.com/properties/86-Pendleton-Ln_Londonderry_NH_03053_M35776-14408"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtor26.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realtor26.p.rapidapi.com/properties/{permalink}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtor26.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: locationLookup
api_list.description: Lookup for locations that are available to use. This endpoint's `key` attribute is necessary for search requests.

api_list.name: searchPropertyForSell
api_list.description: Returns all the properties for sell that matches up by the filters

required_parameters.name: locationKey
required_parameters.description: Location key for the search results. `key` attribute can be retrieved directly from /locations endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: minPrice
optional_parameters.description: Minimum price filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: maxBed
optional_parameters.description: Maximum beds filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: minBath
optional_parameters.description: Minimum baths filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: maxBath
optional_parameters.description: Maximum baths filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting of the search results

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of the properties

optional_parameters.name: minBed
optional_parameters.description: Minimum beds filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: Maximum price filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page for the pagination of the search results
